title: Bosomworth Bike Co Font, help please!
content:
Would really like someone to help identify this font for me,  
The company is quite an old New Zealand bike company, I don’t see this font being custom done for them, anyone have any ideas on what it could be?  
Any help would be great,  
Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bosomworth Decals\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924021513/http:/typophile.com/files/Bosomworth%20Decals_1.jpg) | 28.05 KB |
author: fb2490

comments.content: How likely is it they did design the font themselves, instead of commissioning it?
I does look like an amateur tweak of a professional design.
The company was practically a one man operation, i think from around the 70’s from rural New Zealand, I guess it’s possible, but I thought highly unlikely of a company like that?
